overview: Richard D. Smith has served as a director of Allied Motion since August 1996 and currently serves as Executive Chairman of the Board of Directors and Chief Financial Officer. An Allied Motion employee since 1983, he has held various management positions including President, Executive Vice President, Vice President of Finance, Secretary, Treasurer, and most recently held the positions of Chief Executive Officer and Chief Financial Officer concurrently. Prior to his employment with Allied Motion, Mr. Smith was with Arthur Andersen & Co., a major international public accounting firm, for ten years
